Package GUI.Game.Controllers

Class VillageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.Game.Controllers.GameController
      • GUI.Game.Controllers.VillageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class VillageController
extends GameController
    This controller controls village GUI elements and is an extension of GameController class. This allow the player to visit village establishment and forest from here.

    • Method Detail

      • goToInn

        public void goToInn()
        This will send the player to inn. Creates a new controller and passes all the required data there. Changes the root of current scene to the root of inn.

      • goToForge

        public void goToForge()
        This will send the player to forge. Creates a new controller and passes all the required data there. Changes the root of current scene to the root of forge.

      • goToMarket

        public void goToMarket()
        This will send the player to market. Creates a new controller and passes all the required data there. Changes the root of current scene to the root of market.

      • goToForest

        public void goToForest()
        This will send the player to forest. Creates a new controller and passes all the required data there. Changes the root of current scene to the root of forest.
